front.title: Pilot: Working Group Chair Followup of DISCUSS Comments

abstract.t: As of this writing, many efforts aimed at streamlining various IETF processes are underway. One such effort is the Process and Tools, or PROTO Team. The PROTO Team is an IESG-driven activity focused on improving the work flow of approval of documents, and the tools that support this work flow. This document describes a pilot process designed by the PROTO Team to streamline document flow by allowing working group chairs to coordinate the resolution IESG DISCUSS comments.
